title: Hydroaminomethylation of methyl 10-undecenoate with integrated catalyst recycling via thermomorphic multiphase system for the continuous production of renewable amines
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00109E, Paper
Open Access

Anna Kampwerth, Tim Benjamin Riemer, Jonathan Pöttker-Menke, Nadine Oppenberg, Arno Windisch, Dieter Vogt, Thomas Seidensticker
The thermomorphic multiphase system (TMS) consisting of methanol and n-dodecane was successfully applied to the hydroaminomethylation (HAM) of the renewable methyl 10-undecenoate. By using different amine substrates, a variety of...
